GLCM Features¶

I recommend referencing this tutorial for knowledge gaps here

In total, we have 8 features.

  • Homogeneity

  • ASM

  • Contrast

  • Correlation

  • Mean I

  • Mean J

  • Variance I

  • Variance J

There’s little difference between I and J, they are affect the orientation GLCM was done. See the tutorial.

\[\begin{split}\text{Homogeneity} = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}\frac{P_{i,j}}{1+(i-j)^2}\\ \text{Contrast} = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}P_{i,j}(i-j)^2\\ \text{Angular Second Moment (ASM)} = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}P_{i,j}^2\\ \text{GLCM Mean i, } \mu_i = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}i * P_{i,j}\\ \text{GLCM Mean j, } \mu_j = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}j * P_{i,j}\\ \text{GLCM Mean, } \mu = (\mu_i + \mu_j) / 2\\ \text{GLCM Variance i, } \sigma_i^2 = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}P_{i,j}(i - \mu_i)^2\\ \text{GLCM Variance j, } \sigma_j^2 = \sum_{i,j=0}^{N-1}P_{i,j}(j - \mu_j)^2\\ \text{GLCM Variance, } \sigma^2 = (\sigma_i^2 + \sigma_j^2) / 2\\ \text{Correlation} = \frac{(i - \mu_i)(j - \mu_j)}{\sqrt{\sigma_i^2\sigma_j^2}}\\\end{split}\]

We implemented these few as they are the most orthogonal (according to the tutorial). However, feel free to suggest any more in the GitHub Issue page.
